ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppObservable

    public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppObservable
    class Inventory is designed to store a collection (list) of Game objects and associate them with users.

      • getAllPublicGames

        public java.util.ArrayList<Game> getAllPublicGames()
        Gets all games from the inventory that are listed as public. All games with the private flag will be filtered out from the resulting ArrayList.
        Returns:
        array list of games that are public

        public void addObserver(AppObserver observer)
        Adds the ability to be able to add observers who observe the class.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to be added which wants to be notified on the update.

      • deleteObserver

        public void deleteObserver(AppObserver o)
        The ability to remove an observer from the watch list, thus that observer will not be observing this class anymore.
        Specified by:
        deleteObserver in interface AppObservable
        Parameters:
        o - This observer will be removed.

      • Search

      • Search

        public java.util.ArrayList<Game> Search(java.lang.String query,
                               Game.Platform platform)
        Search the inventory by String and Platform
        Parameters:
        query - the String to search
        platform - only results for this platform will be returned
        Returns:
        an array list of Games containing the search results
